comments.body: I've also renamed `DidChangeWatchedFiles` to `DidChangeWatchedFilesParams` for consistency.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +40,44 @@    case DidSaveTextDocumentParams(td) => onSaveTextDocument(td)
    case DidCloseTextDocumentParams(td) => onCloseTextDocument(td)
    case DidChangeWatchedFilesParams(changes) => onChangeWatchedFiles(changes)
    case DidChangeConfigurationParams(settings) => onChangeConfiguration(settings)
    case e => logger.error(s"Unknown notification $e")

comments.body: it's been bugging me that `connection.showMessage` is red in IJ because this was missing, guess I should consider switching editors soon ^^
